comments_since_last_sample.body: I love these, amazing change, please do more ❤
This is my favorite makeover you’ve done!!!
“I have a lot of anxiety about being out in the world.” You and me both, fam.
Alexandra! This makeover ROCKS. So lovely.
I think u should. Have moved the furniture a different way.

Good job Alexandra! Very nice. And hey, you are such a good leader to the team! 🔥 And also, I feel like we need more of James in the videos 🤩😊 so fun to watch you guys having good time doing what you do ❤️
OH NO XICOOOO ! Speedy recovery Xx

This looks great, and I'm in the same boat (can't drill into walls or paint anything). I'm curious if anyone ever tried hanging a pendant light on one of those ceiling command hooks? I mean, there are these very low-weight pendant lights in Ikea, the paper one or the rattan one. Instead of wiring in the light, you could stick a battery puck light in there or something. I'm considering trying these with wall sconces (they'd be attached with command hooks/strips too).
I loved it! You are so talented!
